name: image-compressor
title: Image Compressor
description: Reduce image file size while maintaining quality (quality=85)
content:
Overview

This application compresses images to reduce file size while maintaining good visual quality. Built using Pillow, it uses quality=85 compression with optimization enabled.

Features

  • Reduces file size while maintaining quality
  • Uses quality=85 for optimal balance
  • Optimizes compression for JPEG and PNG formats
  • Shows compression ratio statistics

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a compressed image with the suffix _compressed in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Reducing file sizes for web uploads
  • Saving storage space
  • Email-friendly image sizes
  • Optimizing images for faster loading
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/image_compressor.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
